testcase.name: should be able to over-ride the content-type
testcase.system-out: Given url demoBaseUrl ..................................................... passed And path 'search', 'headers' .............................................. passed And form field text = 'hello' ............................................. passed And header Content-Type = 'application/json' .............................. passed When method post .......................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And def response = karate.lowerCase(response) ............................. passed And match response['content-type'][0] contains 'application/json' ......... passed
